title: Save $50 on the premium Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 2 earbuds
author: tabitha-baker
summary: Just $10 away from a record low price
article: Sennheiser has cut the price of its powerful Momentum True Wireless 2 earbuds this week - down to just $249.95. That's a $50 discount yielding a final price just $10 away from the lowest cost we've ever seen on these incredible headphones.

Sennheiser's entry into the premium earbud space certainly offers a luxurious package, with excellent sound quality, battery life, and a slick design to boot. However, that $300 MSRP was previously prohibitively expensive for many.

With $50 off the final price, Sennheiser has brought its Momentum True Wireless 2 earbuds down to the original cost of the AirPods Pro. With better noise cancellation, support for more Bluetooth codecs, and that honed Sennheiser audio, this is certainly a competitive price point for some of the best true wireless earbuds on the market. However, if you're leaning towards Apple's iPhone integrations, it's worth noting that the AirPods Pros are currently on sale for $197 at Amazon.
Not in the US? Scroll down for more Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 2 deals in your region.

If you're after something a little cheaper, you'll find plenty of AirPods deals and AirPods Pro price drops available right now. However, we're also rounding up all the latest noise cancelling headphone deals as well. You can also see our guide to the best Memorial Day sales from retailers like Best Buy, Home Depot, and more.
